intro: Click the link and visit my internet home where you can learn more about me and see what projects I've been working on.

sections.content:
Welcome to my internet home. I'm thrilled to have you explore my digital playground, where I showcase my ever-growing portfolio of projects. As a seasoned Program Manager-turned-Frontend Web Developer, I'm on an exciting journey of career transformation.

P.S.
Please leave your shoes at the door :)
